resources.string: It says here:\nWe are studying at BTPIT! instead of Hello, World
And here\'s what happened next, we\'ll find out now

Sunday, June 22, 1941
 The country has woken up peacefully
 On this June day,
 It just opened
 Her lilacs are in the park.
 Rejoicing in the sun and the world,
 Moscow greeted the morning.
 Suddenly they spread across the airwaves
 Memorable words...
 the voice is confident and strict
 The country recognized it immediately.
 On our doorstep in the morning
 The war broke out.
 N. Sidorenko
